title: Illaoi is champion design done right.
body:
She has tons of damage, but most of it is avoidable. She keeps you on your toes during fights.

She doesn't have ridiculous health percent damage.

She doesn't have stupid amounts of crowd control.

She doesn't have game breaking mobility.

She doesn't have some idiotic tank or heal or immunity mechanic.

She's just down right fun to play and for once in years, fun to play against. She's gonna walk up to the fight and start smashing skulls and layin out tentacles.

When I get combo'd by Illaoi it didn't feel like I was cheated with some BS mechanic.

When I duel Illaoi it feels like a battle of skill rather than a battle of numbers.

It feels great to dance around dodging all her stuff to take no damage. But at the same time if you do get hit the reaction is "dammit i messed up" rather than "dammit this shit has no counter play."

Just really great overall design.
